title: Can we make turrets deal hybrid damage?
body: i just think that if the turrets dealt the exact same damage they are doing now but 30% of that damage being magic damage late game tanks would not dive so easily and tank the turret for 10 secs like they dont care.

replies.body:
55/35/10%

55% physical
35% magic
10% true.

That would make turrets more of a problem to deal with.

I'd rather they just increase the initial damage. (and max if tanks are truly a problem.)
If you build tank with all this defense shred floating around, you deserve to have *some* purpose in life.
I get rather tired of watching these squishes tanking laser turrets for 5 seconds, and shrugging it off.
â€”and make tanks that much weaker? Seriously, tanks need more help than not. Buff the damage the turrets deal, sure, but don't screw over tanks even more than they already have been.

A lot of the point that it isn't hybrid damage is likely to ensure you don't get 70+ minute games.
It should be ended, at the latest, within 10 minutes of full builds.
They are tanks... that's what they are supposed to do. Tanks aren't even favourable in the meta anyway. They get kited and melted by adcs. Let them have their ability to tower dive.
